_field_tag_reference_64.name: hybrid vMF probe data per-vertex lite 565

_field_real.name: Near Begin:#Distance at which the light begins affecting things
Far Begin:#Distance at which the light begins affecting at full strength
Camera Distance Fade Start:#Distance at which we start to fade out this light
Camera Distance Fade End:#Distance at which the light should be completely faded out and not seen
Camera Distance Shadow Fade Start:#Distance at which we start to fade out this shadow
Camera Distance Shadow Fade End:#Distance at which the shadow should be completely faded out and not seen

_field_struct.name: Outer Cone Angle Function{Outer Cone End}

_field_long_enum.name: Cone Projection Shape:#Use cone in all cases unless you have a gobo you need to project, frustum uses the full clip area of the light

_field_char_enum.name: Cinema Objects Only#This should only be turned on if you have light linking data correctly setup

item.Name: dont render splitscreen#no rendering this light in splitscreen mode
render in multiplayer override#overrides game settings that disable dynamic lights
move to camera in first person#moves the light to match the camera
always on for weapon#even it is dropped

_field_real.name: destroy light after:seconds#automatically destroys the light after it has existed this long (0 to disable)

item.Name: can be rendered in draw bundles
transparent should output depth for DoF#expensive
do not include in static lightmap
do not include in PVS generation
can be rendered in draw bundles
mash should render in z prepass
mesh has authored lightmap texture coords
mesh has a useful set of second texture coords

_field_short_integer.name: per pixel type{lightprobe texture array index}

item.Name: can be rendered in draw bundles
transparent should output depth for DoF#expensive
do not include in static lightmap
do not include in PVS generation
can be rendered in draw bundles
mash should render in z prepass
mesh has authored lightmap texture coords
mesh has a useful set of second texture coords

_field_short_integer.name: cumulative part count (initialized by PVS building code)

_field_block_64.name: compression info*
_field_block_64._field_explanation:
The following fields are mislabeled for legacy reasons.The actual order is: position_bounds.x0 position_bounds.x1 position_bounds.y0 position_bounds.y1 position_bounds.z0 position_bounds.z1
texcoord_bounds.x0 texcoord_bounds.x1 texcoord_bounds.y0 texcoord_bounds.y1

item.Name: Single Resource#All meshes are packed into a single resource
N Meshes Per Resource#A different number of meshes are packed into each resources. The owning tag decides the packing order.
can be rendered in draw bundles
transparent should output depth for DoF#expensive
do not include in static lightmap
do not include in PVS generation
can be rendered in draw bundles
mash should render in z prepass
mesh has authored lightmap texture coords
mesh has a useful set of second texture coords

_field_short_integer.name: cumulative part count (initialized by PVS building code)

_field_block_64.name: compression info*
_field_block_64._field_explanation:
The following fields are mislabeled for legacy reasons.The actual order is: position_bounds.x0 position_bounds.x1 position_bounds.y0 position_bounds.y1 position_bounds.z0 position_bounds.z1
texcoord_bounds.x0 texcoord_bounds.x1 texcoord_bounds.y0 texcoord_bounds.y1

item.Name: Single Resource#All meshes are packed into a single resource
N Meshes Per Resource#A different number of meshes are packed into each resources. The owning tag decides the packing order.

_field_block_64.name: airprobe analytic data index and counts*
